name: Assistance of police in service or execution
text: [§586-7]  Assistance of police in service or execution.  When an order is issued under this chapter upon request of the petitioner, the court may order the police department to serve the order and related documents upon respondent and to accompany the petitioner and assist in placing the petitioner in possession of the dwelling or residence. [L 1982, c 123, pt of §2]
